title: Gemstones with hex tech boxes?
body: Hi! I was just wondering if gemstones will be available to get for free when purchasing 10 hextech boxes, because i remember them being available when project cache came out..Thanksâ€¦

replies.body:
I'm not really sure, I don't have any information regarding any future promotions for gemstones + boxes planned. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) where such a promo will be announced before it hits the store.

Let me know if you have any questions.
